verses.name: Matthew 17:9
verses.text: And as they came down from the mountain, Jesus charged them, saying, Tell the vision to no man, until the Son of man be risen again from the dead.

verses.name: Matthew 17:10
verses.text: And his disciples asked him, saying, Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come?

verses.name: Matthew 17:11
verses.text: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Elias truly shall first come, and restore all things.

verses.name: Matthew 17:12
verses.text: But I say unto you, That Elias is come already, and they knew him not, but have done unto him whatsoever they listed. Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them.
